attributes.action: deny people like  David Cameron who are voted into power, pensions when theyquit
attributes.additional_details: The ex pm  David Cameron got a golden handshake yet any one who quits is entitled to nothing they least they could be done is they voted on if a person who quits as they like acting like a spoilt child who cant get their own way, the ministers who have quit should be denied money and also an immediate election in their areas for new representatives from all parties
attributes.background: when a prime minster makes on tv a vow then not only fails but quits they like any one else who quits should be denied any money pension, or benefits they would get if they did their job and remained

rejection.details: MPs' pensions are the responsibility of the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority and not the UK Government or Parliament.
